messages.subject: A Request from our intrepid Secretary
messages.msgSnippet: Our madcap  Secretarytocaptthree has asked me to pass on the request for anyone who can, to email her with the known sword style of their favorite Shinsengumi
messages.messageBody:
Our madcap Secretarytocaptthree has asked me to pass on the request
for anyone who can, to email her with the known sword style of their
favorite Shinsengumi member. You may do so at
Scretarytocaptthree(at)hotmail.com
Replace the (at) with @

We now return you to your regular list programming :)

Barb Sheridan
